Flow.description:
Flow Description: Launched from Wrap Up Opportunity H2 to Work a Bond Opportunity/progress the Bond Opportunity.
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.

formulas.name: otherTemplate
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Bond_Opportunity.Are_you_buying_your_first_home__c}, 'Yes'),{!Call_Outcome} != 'Spoke to Customer'), 'FHB Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)', 'Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)')

formulas.name: spokeToCustomerTemplate
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Bond_Opportunity.Are_you_buying_your_first_home__c}, 'Yes'),{!Call_Outcome} = 'Spoke to Customer'), 'FHB Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (Spoke to client)', 'Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (Spoke to client)')

Flow.label: Wrap Up Opportunity - Bond - Subflow

recordUpdates.name: Clear_Out_SLA_for_OTP_Received
recordUpdates.label: Clear Out SLA for OTP Received

recordUpdates.label: Update Bond Opp with Application Type

fields.name: outcomeRequired
fields.fieldText: The Call Outcome field is required.

validationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to set the follow up prior to the current date/time.

fields.name: callBackDTRequired
fields.fieldText: The Call Back Date Time field is required.

fields.name: wrapUpRequired
fields.fieldText: The Wrap Up Comment field is required.

fields.name: otpReceivedBlockMsg_0
fields.fieldText: {!Get_Bond_Opportunity.Name} cannot be worked as it is marked as {!Get_Bond_Opportunity.StageName}.

fields.name: selectLoanType_initial
fields.fieldText: Please select a loan type

fields.name: errorCoAppMissing
fields.fieldText:
The Main Applicant's martial status has been captured as Married (COP), however there is no Co-applicant/spouse associated with the applicant.


A co-applicant must be added in order to progress with this opportunity.


Please select "Add Co-Applicant" to continue:

fields.name: alternativeOTPSource
fields.fieldText: If a registered agent is not found in the search, please click on "Next" to select alternative OTP Sources.

value.stringValue: AND( RecordType.Name = 'Real Estate Agent' OR RecordType.Name = 'Development Agent') AND Visibility__c != 'Hidden' AND Visibility__c != 'Visible for General and Pre-Approval'

fields.name: reUploadOTPPrompt
fields.fieldText:
The Applicants on this Application have changed.


Please re-upload the updated OTP to ensure that the newly changed information corresponds.

fields.name: otpReceivedBlockMsg
fields.fieldText:
{!Get_Bond_Opportunity.Name} cannot be worked while it is in the OTP Received Status.


Please continue with the Application on DealMaker.

fields.name: error
fields.fieldText: Please select a classification

textTemplates.name: chatterBodyAgent
textTemplates.text:
<---- Support Desk Email Sent ---->
Subject: Unregistered Agent for Opportunity: {!bondOppNameFormula}
<---------- Agent Details --------->
First Name: {!First_Name}
Last Name: {!Last_Name}
Email: {!Email}
Phone: {!Mobile}

textTemplates.name: emailBodyAgent
textTemplates.text:
Hi Support Desk,

The following Unregistered Agent's details have been noted for Opportunity: {!Get_Bond_Opportunity.Name}.

Agent Details:

  • First Name: {!First_Name}
  • Last Name: {!Last_Name}
  • Email: {!Email}
  • Phone: {!Mobile}
  • Agency: {!agencyUnreg}

Please ensure the new Agent is captured in DealAdmin.

Thank you,

BetterBond
